docs.snippet: The Bulls had no answer for the young, talented Washington guards John Wall (24 points) and Bradley Beal (17) as they fell in five games to the Wizards in their first-round playoff series....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Bulls had no answer for the young, talented Washington guards John Wall (24 points) and Bradley Beal (17) as they fell in five games to the Wizards in their first-round playoff series.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Washington Wizards beat Chicago Bulls, 75-69, ousting them from playoffs; Wizards will face either Atlanta Hawks or Indiana Pacers in next series; other basketball news noted.
